name: Fat Santa
description:
When i uploaded the game it became all wierd and sadly you can't play most of the levels in the browser, i added the original file if you want to play it how it's supposed to be played.

Made all the assets myself except for sound. Also try hitting santa with a bat...

Failing is progress -> Losing is progress -> Losing weight is progress

Controls:

Click - drag objects

R - Restart

Playable levels in browser: 4-10

Additional notations:

My art = 8-Bit & garbage

Santa = THICC
